name: Way Home (itch) (Bunnypun)
description:
Little Franky is on his way home from his Halloween candy hunt. 

But suddenly he notices that the Halloween decorations all over the place have come to life and are going crazy. 

Franky must fight his way home to escape this haunting. 

Fortunately, there is a lot of candy on Halloween and Franky has his toy gun with him...

Movement 

- Keyboard       W A (S) D

- Gamepad        Left Stick

                            Jump - X

Shoot

 - Keyboard        Shift

 - Gamepad        R1

Feel free to tell me in the comments how many lollipops you found in the whole game (The highscore will appear in the endscreen)

Special Thanks

Andreas HekatesSuende 

Sounds

Epidemic Sounds
